DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect ginger NF-KB level Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells type 2 diabetic patient . Half patient receive ginger , half receive placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Ginger Supplementation NF-KB Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: ginger plant lot phytochemical antioxidant effect . It reduce NF-KB level cell antioxidant effect . It reduce insulin resistance result NF-KB reduction diabetes .
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetes diagnose 1 10 year age 3060 year BMI = 18.535 kg/m*m treatment Metformin Glibenclamide Treatment insulin Weight loss 10 % 6 month Treatment TZDs ( thiazolidinediones ) Pregnancy breast feed Smoking alcohol consumption Multivitaminmineral polyphenols omega3 6 supplementation last 3 month study Ginger supplementation herbal medicine Anticoagulation consumption heparin warfarin NSAIDs diclofenac salicylate drug aspirin , corticosteroid prednisone consumption 1 month ago study Infectious inflammatory disease rheumatoid arthritis Impaired hepatic , renal gastrointestinal function Cancer Currently suffer acute illness need medical treatment
